title: Bubble Ghost
notes: Brings up DOS Box window, which then flickers its logo continuously like it's resetting over and over. Mouse control lost - had to kill manually.

title: Bubble Ghost
notes: Updated notes: DOS Box window doesn't focus - needs Alt-Tab, Enter then F1 to start the game fullscreen. Collision detection non-existent making the game unplayable and graphics "jank" also present. No game exit option from what I can tell (an original oversight?).
